duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide advanced GIS focused Business Analysis and Project Management support to the GIS Unit's Technical Team.
Coordinate the delivery of high-quality applications and services across several enterprise technical teams.
Gather and document requirements for specific projects and track and guide tasks on those projects.
Assist with managing project timelines and also perform testing and troubleshooting of system issues.
Use Microsoft DevOps on a regular basis in support of project efforts.
